item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Things I have done, previously. Worked with various organizations within Seagate's office of the CTO and Product Management. Notable projects, - Product : Lyve Cloud Data Infrastructure. - Market Research: JBOM. - NPI: Seagate PLM to build case for new product in existing swim lane.
